attributes.action: NHS not continuing to fund Breast cancer drugs is not acceptable to the public
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this if you agree that the list out today saying some breast cancer drugs are up for review and may not continue to be funded is unacceptable to the public.

The government should continue to fund these as we are taking about people and not just money.

Shocking that we give money to fund research then find that some drugs are too expensive.

We want assurance from the government that funding will continue.
